  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message​(String encryptingType, int keySize) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Parameters:
      encryptingType - encrypting type with which Message object will encrypt\decrypt received strings
      keySize - size of private/public/secret key that will generated by algorithm of received encrypting type
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - throws if you give to function unsupported encryption type
